pros: True to size; Wider than other Nikes; Breathable; Durable; Very affordable; Grippy thanks to mini lugs; Sleek modern looks; Great, secure fit; Outstanding weight
cons: Not a springy ride; Short runs only
RR_verdict: Nike Quest 4 fills a niche with a trendy-looking shoe at a bargain price. If you desire that Nike swoosh and have less than in your pocket, I certainly recommend this shoe. There aren’t many affordable yet super-competitive options, but to my surprise, this stylish trainer fits the bill! I used it for easy short runs and thoroughly enjoyed its lightness and crazy good grip.
use: Jogging |, Walking |, All-day wear |, For beginners
